name: Omegle Simplified
description:
A new, simpler look for Omegle:
-Simplifies the Homepage.
-Simplifies the Header when in a chat.
additional_info:
v2 (7/8/2013):
-Fixed an issue that would prevent you from entering a spy mode question.
-Fixed an issue that would prevent the "use Facebook likes" check box from showing up.

v1 (7/8/2013):
-Initial Release
